name: Infinity Loom
summary: A loom that weaves threads across endless variations of the run.
positive: Severely reduces drain and grants a decisive calm pocket.

effects.message: You stitch countless outcomes into a single, manageable pace.

Residual threads lash outward once the loom stills.
